description: Normal to others, but a horror show for Mina. The lighting shifts when she focuses on spirits.

gemini.prompt:
Create a background/environment illustration in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Establishing shot of the location
- Bright daylight, clear visibility, natural lighting
- Clear sky
- No characters in the scene
- Detailed environment suitable for webtoon backgrounds
- Wide composition showing the space
- Atmospheric and immersive


Location: The School Hallway
Type: interior
Description: Normal to others, but a horror show for Mina. The lighting shifts when she focuses on spirits.
Visual details: flickering fluorescent lights, greenish tint, rows of metal lockers, shadowy figures in corners, claustrophobic perspective
